name: Puck Bash (itch)
description:
PuckBash is the next evolution of traditional air hockey that combines elements of pinball with air hockey to create the ultimate e-sport experience. 

Key Features

The Evolution of Air Hockey:

Experience the frenzy of Air Hockey pushed to its extremes as the puck reaches lighting speeds.

Take your skills and reflexes to the next level by mastering the super shot ability

A Wide Range of Arenas:

Experience PuckBash in five different unique arenas, such as Classic, Bash, Circular, Rocket, and Propellers.

The Classic arena is a fresh take on Air Hockey adding rotating obstacles that force you to stay on your toes.

Bash pushes the game to the next level by spawning a variety of mods to create the most intense air hockey matches.

Play Air Hockey like never before in the circular and rocket arenas which test your skill reflexes.

Try to survive in Propellers, where you will try to protect your goal against a barrage of pucks.

Game Modes:

You can play PuckBash against your friends locally in PVP mode or hone your skills against the AI in PVE mode.

Note:

This game should be played with a controller.
